recipesJson.name: Cool Tropics
recipesJson.author: ChaoticKinesis
recipesJson.description:
My first mix that I feel pretty good about. After trying a bunch of other recipes, this is my wife's ADV.

The Kiwi and Mango are the dominant fruits. Peach and Strawberry round out the mix on the exhale.

WS-23 is optional if you like a bit of cool with your fruit.
